mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_tb_traderate ( source_order_id, nick, result, rated_nick, item_title, item_price, content, reply, num_iid, order_channel_id, cart_id, created, modified, creater, modifier ) VALUES ( #{source_order_id}, #{nick}, #{result}, #{rated_nick}, #{item_title}, #{item_price}, #{content}, #{reply}, #{num_iid}, #{order_channel_id}, #{cart_id}, #{created}, now(), 'GetTradeRateResultJob', 'GetTradeRateResultJob' )
